languages.text:
On hit target units gain -30 WS and BS.
At the beginning of their turn they must succeed at Reflexes (-10) to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text:
On hit target units gain -30 WS and BS.
At the beginning of their turn they must succeed at Reflexes (-10) to remove this effect.

languages.text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.
languages.original_text: Цель, получившая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} из этого сетемета, получает −30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}. Чтобы снять этот штраф, в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} она должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10.

traits.locale_text: Targets hit by this webber suffer −30 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill. At the start of their turn, they must pass an Agility resistance test with a −10 penalty to remove the effect.

Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

languages.text: Bu ağdolayanın {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} hedefler, −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliğine maruz kalır. Bu etkiyi ortadan kaldırmak için {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turlarının{/g} başında −10 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidirler.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text: Bu ağdolayanın vurduğu hedefler, −30 Silah Yeteneği ve Balistik Yetenek niteliğine maruz kalır. Bu etkiyi ortadan kaldırmak için turlarının başında −10 ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidirler.

Bu ağdolayanın vurduğu hedefler, −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliğine maruz kalır. Bu etkiyi ortadan kaldırmak için {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turlarının{/g} başında −10 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidirler.

languages.text: Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}alcanzados{/g} por este lanzarredes sufren un −30 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. Al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −10 para eliminar este efecto.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos alcanzados por este lanzarredes sufren un −30 a su Habilidad de armas y Habilidad de proyectiles. Al comienzo de su turno deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −10 para eliminar este efecto.

languages.text: 被这把捕网枪{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低30点。受影响的目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中受到-10减值，只有通过检定才能移除此效果。
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text: 被这把捕网枪命中的目标，武器技能与弹道技能降低30点。受影响的目标回合开始时，需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中受到-10减值，只有通过检定才能移除此效果。

languages.text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par ce lance-toile subissent une pénalité de −30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}. Pour supprimer cet effet, elles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −10 au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles touchées par ce lance-toile subissent une pénalité de −30 à la Capacité de combat et à la Capacité de tir. Pour supprimer cet effet, elles doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −10 au début de leur tour.

languages.text: このウェバーで{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されたターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が-30される。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、この効果を取り除くために、-10のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text: このウェバーで攻撃されたターゲットは、武器スキルと弾道スキルが-30される。ターン開始時、この効果を取り除くために、-10のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならない。
このウェバーで攻撃されたターゲットは、武器スキルと弾道スキルが-30される。ターン開始時、この効果を取り除くために、-10のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならない。

languages.text: Von diesem Weber {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele haben -30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffen-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}. Zu Beginn ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} müssen sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -10 bestehen, um diesen Effekt zu entfernen.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text: Von diesem Weber getroffene Ziele haben -30 Waffen- und Ballistik-Fähigkeit. Zu Beginn ihres Zuges müssen sie eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -10 bestehen, um diesen Effekt zu entfernen.

languages.text: Цель, получившая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} из этого сетемета, получает −30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}. Чтобы снять этот штраф, в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} она должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text: Цель, получившая попадание из этого сетемета, получает −30 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою. Чтобы снять этот штраф, в начале своего хода она должна пройти проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −10.

Цель, получившая попадание из этого сетемета, получает −30 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою. Чтобы снять этот штраф, в начале своего хода она должна пройти проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −10.
